definition: to touch/to tap/to contact/(baseball) to bunt
to touch/to make contact with sth/to stir up sb's emotions

sentences.english: There is only one warning before she strikes.
sentences.chinese: 在她触击之前，只有一次警告。

sentences.english: Bill James' belief that outs are too valuable to bunt away.
sentences.chinese: 信出局数太有价值了，不能牺牲触击掉。

sentences.english: He bunted at the first pitch.
Home key to exit to the menu, which you navigate by flicking and tapping.
sentences.chinese: 主按键退回菜单，在菜单中你通过挥动和触击来浏览。

sentences.english: Just tap on the screen to fire.
sentences.chinese: 只要触击屏幕就能开火了。

sentences.english: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
sentences.chinese: 不要让对触击保留的恐惧您从演奏比赛。

sentences.english: Tapping is a left-click, and a long-press equals a right-click.
sentences.chinese: 触击就是左键点击，而长按则表示右键点击。

sentences.english: Home key to exit to the menu, which you navigate by flicking and tapping.
sentences.chinese: 主按键退回菜单，在菜单中你通过挥动和触击来浏览。

definition: to pull out/to pull a lever
with all one's might/with sudden force/violently/to slam
to drag/to tow/(computing) to drag (mouse operation)
to cross the line/to overdo something/to commit a crime
